game.s_dis: The N Game is a physics-based platformer where players control a ninja to navigate deadly obstacles, collect gold, and reach the exit before time runs out.
game.l_dis:
Play N Game Unblocked – Classic Ninja Physics Platformer

N Game is a classic Flash-based 2D platformer developed by Metanet Software. Players take control of a nimble ninja tasked with navigating treacherous levels filled with mines, drones, turrets, and moving traps. The goal is simple but challenging — collect gold to extend your timer and reach the exit door before running out of time. Known for its smooth physics, wall-jumping mechanics, and high skill ceiling, N Game became one of the most iconic Flash games ever made.

What is N Game?

N Game (short for "Ninja") combines minimalist visuals with deep, physics-based gameplay. Each level requires precise timing, parkour-like movement, and quick reflexes to survive. Players can run, jump, slide, and wall-kick to avoid instant-death traps while managing a constantly ticking timer. The game includes multiple episodes with increasingly difficult stages, and its built-in level editor allows fans to create and share custom levels.

How to Play N Game

  • Move: Use the arrow keys to run left and right.
  • Jump: Press [Z] or [Shift] to jump or wall-jump.
  • Objective: Collect gold pieces to increase time and reach the exit door before time runs out.
  • Avoid: Mines, drones, turrets, and other hazards — one hit means instant death!

Why Play N Game Unblocked?

Play N Game unblocked online to relive the classic ninja platforming experience — no Flash player or download needed. This version runs directly in your browser, preserving the precise movement and challenge that made the original famous. Perfect for fans of fast-paced, physics-driven gameplay.

Key Features

  • Challenging Physics: Realistic momentum and gravity-based movement.
  • Wall-Jumping Action: Master timing and precision to scale walls and dodge traps.
  • Level Editor: Create and share your own custom levels.
  • Minimalist Aesthetic: Simple visuals that emphasize gameplay.
  • Legacy Sequel: Inspired future releases like N+ and N++.

About the Developer

Metanet Software, the creators of N Game, are known for their dedication to tight physics and challenging design. The success of the original Flash game led to its enhanced sequel, N++, released for modern consoles and PC, which built upon the same foundation with smoother controls and thousands of levels.

Test Your Reflexes in the N Game!

Dive into one of the most influential Flash platformers of all time. Run, jump, and wall-cling your way through deadly mazes as the ultimate ninja. Play N Game unblocked today and see if you have what it takes to beat its legendary challenges!
